Implemented custom, cloud-native API gateway using Kong, Redis, and Kubernetes clusters, enabling features such as rate limiting, caching mechanisms, bot detection, custom plugins, and advanced authentication.

Successfully migrated legacy applications to containerized solutions using Docker and orchestrated deployments with Kubernetes, enhancing scalability, resource efficiency, and ease of management.
